p: There was no relationship between Δ leaf of T. occidentalis and month of collection. T-test results showed that the mean residual Δ leaf values for each season were not significantly different (Spring: 0.19, Summer: −0.13, Fall: −0.01, Winter: −0.20; Fig. S5A; Month-by-month R 2 = 0.0057; Fig. S5B).
